import React ,{useState, useEffect}from 'react' import { Link, useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../components/Rating' import { listProductDetails} from '../actions/productActions' const ProductScreen = () => { const { id } = useParams() const productDetails = useSelector(state => state.productDetails) const { loading , error , product} = productDetails const dispatch = useDispatch() useEffect(() => { dispatch( listProductDetails(id) ) },[dispatch, id]) return ( <> Go Back

{product.name}

 Price: ${product.price} Description: {product.description} Price: ${product.price} Status: {product.countInStock > 0 ? 'In Stock' : 'Out Of Stock'} ) } export default ProductScreen
